Judul: ARTISTIC Endeavors: Three schoolwide installations showcase the power of art to promote social justice, community, and individualism
Abstrak: In this article the author offers a personal narrative of her experiences helping her students to construct a school-wide art art installation based on the work of the artist Kara Walker.
Sumber: Educational Leadership. Dec2018, Vol. 76 Issue 4, p68-69. 2p
